title: Aged 19 years and over further education and skills learner achievements

versions.title: Aged 19 years and over further education and skills learner achievements
versions.summary: Count of learners achieving a funded further education and skills learning aim, with the exception of community learning, non-qualification parts of the Multiply programme and bootcamps, England, academic years 2016/17 to 2021/22
versions.description:
This dataset shows the count of learners achieving a funded further education and skills learning aim, with the exception of community learning, non-qualification parts of the Multiply programme and bootcamps, in England, for academic years 2016/17 to 2021/22.

Coverage 

England

Geography definition

Counties and Unitary Authorities,
Nation (England)

Source

 - England: [Department for Education]
